task.title: Sweet Vegan Breakfast Recipes
task.shortdesc: Do you have a sweet tooth but eat vegan? No worries. These two recipes are sure to make you happy!

taskbody.context: Below are the names, descriptions and a photo to identify each recipe.

step.info: Delicious vegan blueberry waffles made with whole wheat flour, oatmeal and applesauce. Blueberry Oatmeal Waffles
A delicious and filling vegan breakfast shake you can take on the go! Chocolate Peanut Butter Banana Shake
